website_summaries.verdict: Trustworthy brand in a helmet that has plenty of vents to promote airflow and keep the player cooler.
pros: Offered in multiple fun colors, some of which will really appeal to young players
Padding extends close to the jawline for extra protection
Has an aerodynamic look that players really like
Ships with a face mask attached
Fits teen-age players nicely with just the right amount of padding
cons: Some colors don’t quite match the look of the helmets on the web site

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, color was a little different
customer_reviews.text: The color of this helmet is definitely more on the magenta side, which my daughter actually preferred, but something to note. Fits great, she's nine and has a larger than average head size. Great price and I'm happy she didn't need to use the team helmets, it's really encouraged to get their own helmet for both hygiene reasons and to be ready in the batting order.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Color is not correct!
customer_reviews.text: The helmet color we received looks nothing like the picture I selected when ordering. I wanted The deep purple and it’s definitely not. It’s a nice helmet, but disappointed that the color is nothing like what I thought I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: lisa19rn

customer_reviews.title: No all pinks are the same
customer_reviews.text: I did not give 5 stars because much like other people I didn't get the same pink I ordered. It's a softball helmet so it's really not a big deal but if I would have been ordering based on color to match her team colors it would have been. It has the face guard so it meets our team's safety standards it fits great the only complaint is it's not the exact color I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for kids! Fits 11yr old softball player with room to grow. Not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha Tomasito

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, but one is missing chin strap
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two helmets and both arrived promptly and they fit my 9 and 12 year old girls. I only gave 4 stars because only 1 helmet arrived with a chin strap. I reached out to support to inquire about the second strap being sent to me and will await their response. All in all, great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Forthawife

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 5 year old!
customer_reviews.text: This is made for older kids, but is perfect for my slightly larger headed 5 year old. All of the age appropriate helmets I had gotten her prior would not even go on her head. I went with this one, and it's perfect, but still secure while she is running the bases. The pink is also much brighter than what is pictured, but I had read that in other reviews and that is what I wanted. So it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MDGirl82

customer_reviews.title: Like the color
customer_reviews.text: Like the color. It is for our 8yr old so we had to add some padding inside for it to fit. I like that it does come with the mask and a chin strap. Only 3 stars as the padding inside is not as good as some helmets (it's thick enough, but doesn't cover the inside like others. Plus there is a sticky residue where the padding isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Sheber

customer_reviews.title: Softball helmet for girls!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 10 year old daughter. Cool color and great brand. This is what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Angie B

customer_reviews.title: She said it was comfortable as well
customer_reviews.text: Helmet is exactly as described. Fit perfectly on my 13 year old with a small head. She said it was comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: J Austin

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Helmet with Good Visibility
customer_reviews.text: The helmet has a solid build quality and fit. The color is a matte finish pink with a white cage. Welike the protection as my daughter also wears a mask in the field. The visibility is clear while batting.
customer_reviews.author: SeanO

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet, wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Good helmet. Just not even close to the color pictured. It looks like a deep blueish purple in the picture, but arrived as a bright fuchsia pinky purple. Daughter didn't mind, but that's why it's not a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Kricks53

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet, But Check Academy First
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, sturdy helmet. Fantastic color. The helmet arrived with a sticker from Academy, priced at $36. I paid $59.99. So you might want to check Academy Sports and Outdoors first.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Couture

customer_reviews.title: Really- it is NOT purple.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this helmet for my daughter- her team color is purple- but the helmet is most definitely not purple. Otherwise- it is well constructed and I think will provide the necessary protection regardless of the color ☺️
customer_reviews.author: D. Lemley

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and looks great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great helmet for the value. My daughter started playing softball this year and wanted her own helmet. She is 9 and it fit her perfect. Nice helmet without spending a fortune on one.
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for young player. My 6 year old granddaughter uses it for softball. Great price! She loves neon green, so this was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Rosaidh Ceallach

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for 10 year old and has many years left! Awesome color. Would say it’s a bit brighter pink though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could have probably gone to a smaller size, but it fits snug enough
customer_reviews.text: The facemask gave my son some confidence or calmed his nerves I guess, cuz he had a long string of hits after getting this.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and safe!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome color! Fits snugly but not tight. Great color! Easy to see her on the field!
customer_reviews.author: Forensic Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Not purple
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, though the color is more of a fuchsia and purple. I bought for my son, his team is always purple, but had to give it to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Tikkala

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Fits my nearly nine year old well. She’s tall for her age with an average sized head. My daughter loves the color which is a bit brighter than what was shown on the description.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Color is more pink than purple
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her helmet. Fits snug but not uncomfortable. We ordered purple but the one we received is more of a bright fuchsia (in photo). She loves it still so we are happy with the surprise color because the helmet is sturdy and safe
customer_reviews.author: Trace E.

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love it and cannot wait to start playing in them.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.. NC

customer_reviews.title: Purple is not purple
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to the purple advertised. Returned. Nice quality but the color was way off
customer_reviews.author: Lori Good

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ventilation
customer_reviews.text: This helmet provides great ventilation for our tropical climate as well as it has a gap provided for a pony tail . My niece was happy for that because she did not want to get her hair cut .
customer_reviews.author: Jay wason

customer_reviews.title: A Great Baseball Helmet for Kids
customer_reviews.text: The item is comfortable, very sturdy and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: R. N.

customer_reviews.title: Not purple
customer_reviews.text: The helmet was ok but the purple I received was nothing like the purple pictured. It was more of a fuchsia color. When I pulled the sizing sticker off you could see the color difference as if it was faded or something.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Hard to button
customer_reviews.text: It's hard for my 9 year old to button the strap by herself.
customer_reviews.author: shopeen

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my 7 year old for softball. She wanted a pink helmet and this worked for us. It looks matte also so that is nice.
customer_reviews.author: onlinemamaa

customer_reviews.title: Love the color.
customer_reviews.text: The helmet works prefect. Its slightly big for my 7 year old but she will grow into it and I love that she stands out in the sea of pink.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cap

customer_reviews.title: Protective and great value
customer_reviews.text: Cute and provides great protection. She got hit in the head with a softball and it never phased her.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Hern

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Color is more of a magenta
customer_reviews.text: Fits my first and second grade girls noggins. Excellent quality. Color is more of a magenta, not really purple, but the girls approve.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We love it, it's not too tight but then at the same time it's not too lose.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality helmet!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality helmet!! I got black so it would match my daughters uniform and it is very nice looking. Fits my 9 year old great and room to use a few years. She was so happy with the purchase and to not have to share helmets all the time:)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits our almost five year old great and it's super cute!! I was so happy it was neon pink too! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 8 year old. It has a little wiggle room which may get better adjusting the chin strap.
customer_reviews.author: Christin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Helmet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this helmet. It fit her perfectly for coachpitch softball.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Streitenberger

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 6/7 year old
customer_reviews.text: My daughter moved up to softball and this helmet is great!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great softball helmet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this softball helmet for my daughter who is 8 yrs. I was a little bit hesitant in the beginning due to the fact that she has a small head but it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and good quality for what we need.
customer_reviews.text: Seller is very prompt to ship the helmet. Tried on my 8 year old girl. It fits her well with room to grow. It’s also her favorite color. Very good price, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Not the color I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Good quality helmet. I bought it because my daughter is outgrowing the smaller orange one she had for Ponytail League. Ordered Matte Purple to match the school colors, received a fusia like color.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite helmet so far
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit for 9 year old daughter. Bright neon green. My daughter loved the look and feel of the helmet. Her only issue was the difficulty of snapping the chin strap.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet. Colors may not be accurate
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the helmet. It was one of the few softball helmets that fit my tiny head. I first ordered the purple which was more of a fuschia. I exchanged it for the black. Very happy. I am a thirteen years old
customer_reviews.author: Robin M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice matte black helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect helmet for my 9 year old. The fit is comfortable, and I like the matte black look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Webster

customer_reviews.title: Not for a child...made for adults
customer_reviews.text: This came up while searching for a little girls helmet. It is not. My seven year old is swallowed in it. I can actually get it on comfortably. Made for an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Moore

customer_reviews.title: good helmet
customer_reviews.text: 8 yr old daughter loves it. is just a tad too big but she will grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: honeydidn't

customer_reviews.title: Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: Helmet fits my daughter pretty well (8). It is a tiny bit big but she is a tiny girl. Love the bright green and Matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: nicholest

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 11 year old perfect. Love the matte black!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Pevey

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on my Grand-daughter. Fits great, she is 11.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The color is not as pictured. I ordered the “purple” and it was more of a pink color. Other than that the quality of the helmet is great and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: Too big for 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: Very nice helmet BUT it doesn’t fit my 8 year old daughter! It’s way too big!
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my 9 year old and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Donnaps

customer_reviews.title: pretty great
customer_reviews.text: beautiful helmet. Fits my 5 year old perfectly. Can't wait for her to get to use it for softball
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: This is the right choice!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is great! Fits my daughter perfectly, top quality and looks much more expensive than what it costs.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cost Effective Helmet
customer_reviews.text: My 12 y/o daughter loves this helmet. It’s comfortable and fits great. The “purple” is more of a bright pink/purple but she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Sunick

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome helmet! Great fit, visibility, and comfort. The matte color looks great out on the field. My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: Helmet fits my 10-year-old daughter. Love the color and the style.
customer_reviews.author: mortar516

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fits perfectly. Great condition and shipped and arrived quickly. My daughter wants to write phrases on it in chalk before each game.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet, daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Good helmet, only small negative is that it fades from that bright color fairly quickly, but still a good helmet
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Guillan

customer_reviews.title: product needed to be more as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It was not the color on this picture. It was more of a pink or fuschia color. Wanted real purple like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Anita St.Romain

customer_reviews.title: Bought used- looked like new.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Happy with the purchase. Fit my daughter perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Diana S.

customer_reviews.title: NOT PURPLE LIKE IN THE PICTUTE AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: The purple one in the picture is nothing close to what i got. I would call it pink before i would call it purple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, easy on/off fit.. , color variety true as shown
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and the colors are spot on as shown. I bought two different colors for my daughters and they love. Easy on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and comfortable. My daughter plays softball and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: CLO

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet
customer_reviews.text: The Cushion on the inside is really comfortable. was a lot better then we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Warren B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my preteen softball player
customer_reviews.text: Nice helmet- fits my 12 year old well and she loves it. She's 5 foot 3.
customer_reviews.author: MDIMama

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a great helmet and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. She says is comfortable and fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Kay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome helmet!!
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet! My daughter likes the way it fits and the blue color!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Clark

customer_reviews.title: She loves the color and it fits nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughter. She loves the color and it fits nicely.
customer_reviews.author: jrfe

customer_reviews.title: Helmet Arrived with Scratches
customer_reviews.text: The helmet arrived with scratches in multiple places. The helmet's structure was intact, however it was very disappointing to receive a brand new helmet with so many obvious flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived timely. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet! My 8 year old daughter loves it and it fits her perfectly. The color is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet.
customer_reviews.text: Nice helmet.. I like the matte finish on it. It fits well and my daughter is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren1012

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet, nice pop of color. I personalized my daughters helmet and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for your kids!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and finish. Great product and always great service.
customer_reviews.author: David Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The helmet itself is good, however I ordered the purple and the helmet looks like the pink one.
customer_reviews.author: J Woo

customer_reviews.title: Like a few have already said
customer_reviews.text: Like a few have already said, the color is way off. I ordered a dark purple helmet and I got a neon magenta. I think my niece will still like it, but I bought the purple to match her purple bat. Obviously that can't happen now. Helmet is very well made and looks great. Would be a five star if the color wasn't falsely advertised.
customer_reviews.author: cakes

customer_reviews.title: Not for the little ones
customer_reviews.text: So far this is an unboxing -- it's adult size. My girls are normal sized 7yos and this fit my head. My husband says it's the same size as the one her twin sister wore all last season with no problem so we are keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: MidwestBec

customer_reviews.title: Off Color
customer_reviews.text: very off color, it was supposed to be a dark purple like I saw in the picture but it is a bright magenta. very dissapointing. It also had many dirt and scuff marks on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is a little big on my just turned 8 year old, but he'll grow into it. Love the quality and love the color. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not to mention the color is hot pink and looks nothing like the picture online
customer_reviews.text: Arrived totally scratched up. I paid to have it delivered in one day because I needed it immediately so I do not have time to return it. Total bummer. Not to mention the color is hot pink and looks nothing like the picture online.
customer_reviews.author: BeachyCC

customer_reviews.title: Not Purple, but....
customer_reviews.text: Helmet was in great shape but the color was way off! It arrived as a bright magenta instead,but my 5 year old daughter loves it and gets tons of compliments each game.

customer_reviews.title: It fits!
customer_reviews.text: My 9yo has a big head and thick hair but it fit her well. She's a bigger build and tall for her age so I was worried. Since I bought this midseason I hope it will fit her next year too :)
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

product_meta.title: Rawlings Sporting Goods Highlighter Series Softball Helmet
product_meta.description: Rawlings' Coolflo technology, first introduced in 2006, forever revolutionized batting helmet protection with its state-of-the-art venting system and sleek, aerodynamic look. Initially worn by all Major League Baseball athletes. Specifically constructed for the athlete desiring a helmet with an established history of excellence along with pro-inspired attributes, Rawlings Coolflo models will continue to redefine the standards of traditional helmet design. Traditional COOLFLO design. Pre-drilled for NOCSAE approved face guards. Molded finish.
feature_bullets: Made of the highest quality materials
Refer to the PDF attached below for Sizing
